title: DAA Pack Metadata Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating pack.yaml files in the DAA ecosystem

id.description: A unique, lowercase, hyphenated identifier for the Pack

name.description: The human-readable name of the Pack

version.description: The version of the Pack, following Semantic Versioning (e.g., 1.0.0)

author.description: The name and email of the developer or organization

description.description: A brief description of the Pack
